name: CMIOExtensionProviderProperties
desc: An object that manages the properties of an extension provider.

items.name: init(dictionary: [CMIOExtensionProperty : CMIOExtensionPropertyState<AnyObject>])
items.desc: Creates a provider properties object with the specified properties.

items.name: func setPropertyState(CMIOExtensionPropertyState<AnyObject>?, forProperty: CMIOExtensionProperty)
items.desc: Sets a state value for the specified property.

items.name: var propertiesDictionary: [CMIOExtensionProperty : CMIOExtensionPropertyState<AnyObject>]
items.desc: A dictionary of properties for a provider.
